title: Olive Oil Sprayer for Cooking, 200ml glass Olive oil sprayer Mister, cooking oil sprayer, Oil Spray Bottle, canola oil sprayer, air fryer for Salad Making, Baking, Frying, BBQ, Grilling Kitchen Tools
descriptions:
Title: Olive Oil Sprayer for Cooking, 200ml – Fine Mist Glass Dispenser for Air Fryer, BBQ, Baking, and Salads

Short Description:
Elevate everyday cooking with a 200ml glass olive oil sprayer that delivers a fine, even mist for precise, mess-free coverage. Designed with an inline nozzle, sealed threads, and pressurized spray mechanism, it provides consistent 60° high atomization while preventing leaks and drips. Ideal for olive oil, vinegar, soy sauce, and more—perfect for salads, air frying, grilling, baking, and pan prep.

Key Features:
- Fine, even mist: 60° high atomization produces a uniform spray that helps control portions and avoid oversaturation.  
- Leak-proof design: Inline nozzle and sealed threads keep the bottle mouth clean and prevent messy drips.  
- Precise volume control: Pressurized nozzles deliver consistent output for better oil management and healthier cooking.  
- Easy to press: Smooth, energy-saving trigger reduces hand fatigue during repeated use.  
- Durable and food-safe: Clear glass bottle with food-grade PET and PP components.  
- Eco-friendly choice: Refillable, reusable design helps reduce waste and carbon footprint.  
- 200ml capacity: Generous size minimizes refills while staying compact for countertop or cabinet storage.

Versatile Use:
- Compatible liquids: Olive oil, vegetable oil, coconut oil, soy sauce, vinegar, wine, and water.  
- Cooking methods: Salad making, baking, frying, BBQ, grilling, and air fryer applications.  
- Great for: Coating pans, marinating, finishing dishes, misting salads, and hydrating baked goods.

How to Use:
- Fill up to, but not beyond, the recommended line (do not overfill).  
- Tighten the cap securely to engage the sealed threads.  
- Pump or press to spray a fine, even mist at a 60° angle over your food or cookware.  
- For best results, keep the nozzle clean and store upright.

Care Instructions:
- Handle the glass bottle with care.  
- Rinse with warm, soapy water and allow to dry before refilling.  
- Avoid overfilling to maintain optimal spray performance.

What’s Included:
- 1 x 200ml glass oil sprayer with food-grade PET/PP sprayer head.

Make every calorie count and every dish shine with a clean, controlled, and eco-friendly oil misting experience.
